ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11536 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.146"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11276)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="9279-1" Respiratory rate (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10287)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:11277)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="PQ" (CONF:10288)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.14 UCUM units SHOULD be "/min".
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11276)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="9279-1" Respiratory rate (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10287)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:11277)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="PQ" (CONF:10288)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.14 UCUM units SHOULD be "/min".

body.codeblock: <observation classCode="SPCOBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.146"/> <code code="9279-1" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" displayName="Respiratory rate"/> <value xsi:type="PQ"/> </observation>
